name: getSOAPRequest
description:
Returns an XML object that contains the entire SOAP
 request. Usually called from within a web service CFC.

params.name: webservice
params.description: A webservice object as returned from the cfobject tag or the CreateObject function

examples.title: Create a SOAP call and retrieve the request
examples.description: Create a SOAP webservice to call, then we can use  getSOAPRequest() to view the request
